metadata.name: Execution of Powershell Script in Public Folder
metadata.comment: This rule detects execution of PowerShell scripts located in the "C:\Users\Public" folder

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\powershell.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\pwsh.exe'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-f c:\\users\\public')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-f "c:\\users\\public')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-f %public%')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-fi c:\\users\\public')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-fi "c:\\users\\public')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-fi %public%')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-fil c:\\users\\public')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-fil "c:\\users\\public')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-fil %public%')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-file c:\\users\\public')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-file "c:\\users\\public')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-file %public%'))))

output.summary: This rule detects execution of PowerShell scripts located in the "C:\Users\Public" folder

metadata.objective: Examine fields: process.cmd_line False positive: Unlikely Reference: https://www.mandiant.com/resources/evolution-of-fin7
